amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds in the bill from being used to provide reimbursement for beneficiary travel if it is based on a mileage allowance rate that is less than the rate in effect under title 5, USC, for Federal employee travel.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Moran (KS) amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Moran (KS).
